This was my second front end project and I wanted to make a digital etch a sketch to figure out more types of user interactions.

### To use:
- Open the index.html file and that's it
- Keyboard shortcuts: R to resize, D to toggle draw, C to clear, G to toggle grid
- Click coloured box to select a new colour

### Possible Improvements </br>
- Option to allow the user to draw with 100% opacity on the first pass
- Implementing an option to click to draw instead of using a toggle
- Adding a fill bucket feature
